doc.title: Karrewiet
doc.plot: This Flemish format, the fantasy title of which is no official Dutch word or compound, mixes selected fragments from the regular daily news with specially shot clips -such as short interviews with children; some even get a part as 'guest reporter', e.g. visiting a major trade fair- on the same, related or additional subjects, specifically for a young audience, in a corresponding simple language, with a preference for items from or closely related to daily life, rather then politics or economics. On Sunday there is a digest compilation, "De Week van Karrewiet".
